name: SynthRoads
description: As  rookie game developers who started making their own games, We decided to publish our first hypercasual game. We are trying to get score points by moving on an endless road through colored obstacles. By picking up the capsules on the ground, we can pass through the obstacles of the relevant colors. There is more than one way to overcome an obstacle and more will be added in the future. We would appreciate your donations so that we can develop this game and do more projects in the future.
